content: तारक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (रिका|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [तॄ-णिच् ण्वुल] {@--1@} Carrying over. {@--2@} Protecting, preserving, rescuing. {@--3@} Helping another through a difficulty. --कः {@--1@} A pilot, helmsman. {@--2@} A deliverer, saviour. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. --कः, --कं A boat, raft. --कं {@--1@} The pupil of the eye. {@--2@} The eye (also {%<ab>f.</ab>%}).
